game.name: Abyssal Anarchy
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A fast-paced co-op spell-hell where each map pulls you deeper into the Abyss. Choose from 5 heroes and 14 spells, unlock upgrades, and survive alone or with friends as the magic grows wilder with every descent.
